repository.description: The repository associated with the project.

owner_url.description: The URL to view the owner or creator of the project.

url.description: The URL for accessing the project.

html_url.description: The HTML URL for viewing the project.

columns_url.description: The URL to view the project's columns or categories.

id.description: The unique identifier for the project.

node_id.description: The Node ID associated with the project.

body.description: The description or main content of the project.

state.description: The state or status of the project.

creator.description: The user or entity who created the project.

created_at.description: The date and time when the project was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the project was last updated.
